description: The initiative focuses on creating a sustainable dining experience through the first zero waste restaurant in Armenia, Steakarar. Established by Vahe and his partners, the restaurant emphasizes organic, locally sourced ingredients and minimizes waste by adapting its menu based on available produce. The goal is to inspire other businesses to adopt similar sustainable practices while promoting a culture of environmental responsibility. The initiative also includes educational efforts to engage employees and the community in sustainability efforts.
name: Steakarar Restaurant
